meanings.definition: Extremely high in level or degree.
meanings.sent1: The mountain peak was ultrahigh, reaching far into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraper had an ultrahigh tower that could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The ultrahigh price of the luxury car made everyone gasp.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrahigh expectations for the project pushed everyone to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The ultrahigh temperature in the desert made it unbearable to stay outside.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to frequencies above the audible range.
meanings.sent1: The ultrahigh sound frequency could only be heard by dogs.
meanings.sent2: The ultrahigh pitch of the whistle was too high for human ears to detect.
meanings.sent3: The ultrahigh frequency of the radio waves amazed the scientists.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrahigh voice could shatter glass with its piercing tone.
meanings.sent5: The ultrahigh frequency signal was perfect for transmitting data over long distances.

meanings.definition: A level or degree that is higher than usual.
meanings.sent1: The ultrahigh of excitement at the concert was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The ultrahigh of success he achieved was beyond his wildest dreams.
meanings.sent3: Reaching an ultrahigh of boredom, she decided to go for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The ultrahigh of adrenaline during the race made him feel invincible.
meanings.sent5: The ultrahigh of happiness she felt on her birthday was unforgettable.
